Subject: Re: Predicon Mission to ensure the Predicon Future

MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
From: Roaklin <roaklin@...>

 Her name was the Iron Fist, the newest addition and 
pride of the Predcion Battle Fleet. Inspired by the
ancient decepticon warship Nemsis she was slightly
larger, with four huge gun turrets mounting plasma
cannons, four guns foward and four guns aft of the
massive superstructure. Her metallic grey hull gleamed
in the glare of the space docks lights as the crew
finished last minute preperations for departure.

 Major Panzertron stood on the bridge of the warship,
his towering figure dominating the crew areas. The
drones at the controls busied themselves with the
pre-departure procedures. 

 Panzertron thought throu his mission again and a
smile played across his metallic face, Hell Beast was
in for quite a suprise.

=====
When the going gets tough,
the tough go get a tank!
